thread.title: Video shows how inflatable backpack saved snowboarder during avalanche near Whistler
thread.title_full: Video shows how inflatable backpack saved snowboarder during avalanche near Whistler

author: Postmedia News
title: Video shows how inflatable backpack saved snowboarder during avalanche near Whistler
text:
A snowboarder caught in an avalanche near Whistler, B.C., on Wednesday was saved by an inflatable backpack. And he caught it all on video.
Tom Oye, a 29-year-old from Australia, took the spill Wednesday morning and had posted his video by 4:30 p.m.
The video shows the slab avalanche starting just below the front of his board, before Oye goes down and his camera becomes partially obscured by the snow during the slide.
Screengrab According to ABC in Australia, Oye received the backpack from his 82-year-old grandma as a birthday gift during a recent visit home.
The pack that kept him above the fray was a Jetforce, by Austrian company Pieps.
